name: fission
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
physics
  specialized the process of dividing the nucleus of an atom, resulting in the release of a large amount of energy : nuclear fission In nuclear fission, a uranium atom is divided into 2 small atoms.
biology
  specialized the division of a living cell as part of reproduction: fission of The fission of the cell could be inhibited with certain chemicals.

physics the dividing of the nucleus of an atom, producing energy

a process in which the nucleus of an atom divides and releases a large amount of energy: atomic/nuclear fission Industrialized nations should increase their efforts in supporting energy efficiency, renewable energy, and nuclear fission.
